document.masterDocTitle: Atyid shrimps (Crustacea: Decapoda: Caridea) of the Ryukyu Islands, southern Japan, with descriptions of two new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Atyid shrimps (Crustacea: Decapoda: Caridea) of the Ryukyu Islands, southern Japan, with descriptions of two new species

subSubSection.paragraph:
Caridina gracilirostris De Man, 1892, p 399
(part), pl 25, fig. 31a–c [ type locality: river near Maros , Sulawesi ( Celebes ), Indonesia ].
Lower reaches of rivers and streams which discharge to the sea.
This species was recently reported by Shokita (2003). The single specimen on which Shokita’s (2003) record was based could not be located in the present study.

bibRefCitation.author: Stimpson W
bibRefCitation.refString: Stimpson W. 1860. Prodromus descriptionis animalium evertebratorum, quae in Expeditione ad Oceanum Pacificum Septemtrionalem, a Republica Federata missa, C. Ringgold et J. Rodgers, observavit et descriptist. Proceedings of the Academy of Natural Science of Philadelphia 1860 (January): 22 - 47.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Caridina grandirostris
Stimpson, 1860 , p 97
[ type locality: Okinawa ( Loo Choo ) Island, Ruykyu Islands , Japan ].

Caridina grandirostris : Hayashi 1989c , p 312
, fig. 169e; Shokita 2003, p 249, figs. 18B, 19F, 20K;
Shokita et al. 2003a , p 101
; Cai et al. 2006, p 397, figs. 4–6.

materialsCitation.collectorName: Island & Y. Cai & Cai, N. K & Naruse & S. Islam & Others & N. K. Ng & P. K. L Ng & P. K. L. Ng

subSubSection.paragraph: Lower reaches of rivers and streams which discharge to the sea.

Cai et al. (2006) recently designated a neotype for
C. grandirostris Stimpson, 1860
and redescribed it in detail.

Caridina grandirostris
has thus far only been reported from Japan .
